E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 8/1/1991
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Alan Trammell



Date: Thursday, 8/7/1991
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
George Brett



Date: Monday, 8/25/1991
Subject: Progress of Ron Mahay
Dear Sir,
Ron Mahay has nothing more to prove at A Visalia Oaks!
He has an ERA of 3.98 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
